name: Vocabulary Tester
short_description:
This is a program (written in Python, with graphics based on the Tk/Tcl framework) to test on vocabulary. It allows users to define their own languages and constructs per language. Afterwards, a dictionary of words can be created and the user can be tested on this dictionary.

Currently, it is in v0.8 (Beta) of development.

After a stable version is released (v1.0), a more detailed repository will be kept.
